pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==============oceanum-python==============.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/oceanum.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/oceanum.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/oceanum/oceanum.svg :target: https://travis-ci.org/oceanum/oceanum.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/oceanum/badge/?version=latest :target: https://oceanum.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest :alt: Documentation StatusLibrary for oceanum.io services* MIT license* Documentation: https://oceanum-python.readthedocs.io.Features--------* Simple pythonic access to the Oceanum datameshCredits-------This package was developed by `Oceanum Numerical <https://www.oceanum.science>`_, with input from our development partners and contributors.
